mapper.sql: select LEGISLATION_REFORM_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, LEGISLATION_REFORM_NAME, LEGISLATION_REFORM_TIME, LEGISLATION_REFORM_MEASURES, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG from inspection_legislation_reform
mapper.select: select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(r.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_legislation_reform r on u.UNITS_ID = r.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID

select LEGISLATION_REFORM_ID, PLAN_ID, UNITS_ID, LEGISLATION_REFORM_NAME, LEGISLATION_REFORM_TIME, LEGISLATION_REFORM_MEASURES, r.CREATED_BY, r.CREATED_TIME, r.UPDATED_BY, r.UPDATED_TIME, r.ENT_ID, APPROVER_ID, APPROVER_NAME, APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_legislation_reform r left join piis_document doc on concat('LegislationReform', r.LEGISLATION_REFORM_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where r.LEGISLATION_REFORM_ID = #{legislationReformId}
